channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At least 2 killed and 8 injured hurt in shooting at Brown University with suspect still at large
item.description: The suspect was a male who was dressed in black and last seen leaving the building, said Timothy O’Hara, Deputy Chief of Police.

item.title: Danish intelligence report warns of U.S. economic leverage and military threat under Trump
item.description: “China and Russia, together with other like-minded states, are seeking to reduce Western–and particularly US–global influence," the report said.

item.title: U.S., Mexico strike deal to settle Rio Grande water dispute
item.description: Both governments agreed that Mexico will deliver an additional 202,000 acre-feet of water beginning the week of Dec. 15 and finalize a broader distrib...

item.title: Microsoft AI boss Suleyman opens up about his peers and calls Elon Musk a ‘bulldozer’ with ‘superhuman capabilities to bend reality to his will’
item.description: "And somehow he sort of mostly manages to pull off what appears to be impossible."

item.title: Big 12 in advanced talks for deal with RedBird-backed fund
item.description: The partnership would offer the 16 member universities a line of credit of roughly $30 million each and is close to being finalized.
